Articles.Content:
Hiya,
I'm aware of the Breaking Ground expansion, but I was wondering if the latest Infernal Robotics mod by Magic Smoke was compatible with 1.9. Last time I used IR was 2015, so I'm just wondering if it's still up-to-date. Thanks!

3 hours ago, CDK said:

Check out IR-Next and KJR-Next
